about_text_2: I'm coming from the CNC industrie , where i was a programmer. 12 years past away with programming in Fanuc and Siemens, but I always wanted to be an IT guy, so last year i assigned to a bootcamp, at Webler, and i taught many things. I'm very excited about this new direction.
about_text_3: If you interested about me, please continue scrolling
skills_text_1: Web development for me, is passion.I like creating sites, user environments, and overall designing the page, however i'm not a webdesigner.
skills_text_2: My future plan is updating my
skills_text_3: knowledge, and learn different frameworks, to be a professional
skills_text_5: knowledge , Fast typing.I'm improving myself, and doing projects every day!

projects.title: Portfolio 2.0
projects.description: The project was created for applying a job offer.I tried to approuch a different design.Uses Frontend validation on Contact form
projects.note: This Project is responsive on all screen sizes

projects.title: Insure Landing Page
projects.description: This project is based on Frontend mentors design.This was my first project that i used ReactJs and Sass preprocessor.The design was challenging and learned a lot from it.
projects.note: This Project was created to match the resolution for 375px and 1440px.
projects.tech: HTML, CSS, SCSS, ReactJs, React Router, Hash Link, Boxicon Icons

projects.title: Dragon Ball Fanpage
projects.description: This project was my module final test at my school for SCSS.The rules was simple , write an SPA with your favorite brand. Well i really like dragonball, and I choose that.
projects.note: This Project is responsive on all screen sizes
projects.tech: HTML, CSS, SCSS, ReactJs, React Router,Link,

projects.title: Todo App with React
projects.description: This is a Todo app with React.You can add Todo, select Todo, you can delete Todo
projects.note: I created this project to be responsive overall all screens

projects.title: Url Shortening Api with React
projects.description: This Project uses an Api , that shorts all url that is inserted in the input field,and displays the original and the shortened link.You can copy itt to the Clipborad with one button click !
projects.note: This Project was created to match the resolution for 375px and 1440px.
projects.tech: React, React Router, Scss, CopytoClipboard library, Axios to API call

projects.title: Sufni Gsm with Context Api
projects.description: This Project uses an Api call, for data from different currency , you can select your phone , and take that data to the Calculation page where you can calculate the price , depending on the phones.json data. For this i use Context API.
projects.note: Responsive, mobile screen optimalization is currently in progress
projects.tech: React, React Router, Css, React - Context API, Axios to API call
